title: Movietone Newsreel Font
content:
Anyone know of a font similar to the "MOVIETONE NEWS" font from this old newsreel?

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20101105143034im_/http:/typophile.com/files/MOVIETONE_3495.jpg)
author: kiarostami

comments.content:
Reminescent:  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/vibrocentric/](http://web.archive.org/web/20101105143034/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/vibrocentric/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/vibrocentric/")

But I think you would be better served customizing some Copperplate Gothic:  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/search/copperplate+gothic/fonts/](http://web.archive.org/web/20101105143034/http:/new.myfonts.com/search/copperplate+gothic/fonts/ "http://new.myfonts.com/search/copperplate+gothic/fonts/")
Yup, Letterhead has some amazing stuff of that vintage look.
